title: 1 Bedroom, Close to Shopping, Freeways, Public Transportation & More!
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 700 Sq.
Welcome to Alvista Lake Meridian Apartments in Kent, Washington.
Our beautiful community is located between Lake Meridian Park and Big Soos Creek with easy access to Highway 18.
This is the location where you will find modern day living combined with the tranquility you’ve been craving.
You are only minutes from great shopping, fine dining, and ample entertainment.
Needing a break from the day to day?
No worries, we are conveniently located near countless parks for outdoor activities.
Come and check out Alvista Lake Meridian Apartments – you will be delighted at the possibilities!

Views Available, Dishwasher, All-electric Kitchen, 9Ft Ceilings, Disability Access, Cable Ready, Vaulted Ceilings*, Laundry Room*, Refrigerator, Vertical Blinds, Washer and Dryer in Home, Ceiling Fans, Extra Storage, Wood Burning Fireplace, Carpeted Floors, Balcony or Patio

Public Parks Nearby, Section 8 Welcome, Access to Public Transportation, Soothing Hot Tub, State-of-the-art Fitness Center, Assigned Parking, Easy Access to Freeways and Shopping, Children's Play Area, Short-term Leasing Available, Covered Parking, Shimmering Swimming Pool, Guest Parking, Beautiful Landscaping, On-call Maintenance, Cable Available
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
